Trade/Device Name(s): VALIDATE D-Dimer Calibration Verification / Linearity Test Kit
VALIDATE® D-Dimer Calibration Verification / Linearity Test Kit
Regulation Name(s): Multipurpose system for in vitro coagulation studies
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for VALIDATE D-Dimer Calibration Verification / Linearity Test Kit for in vitro calibration verification and linearity assessment of D-Dimer assays.
Indications for Use Summary: Assayed quality control materials for quantitative determination of linearity, calibration verification, and verification of reportable range for D-Dimer in clinical laboratory settings, for use with quantitative assays on indicated analyzers.
